message: I understand you want a fair deal, so I propose we switch amounts. This ensures we both benefit before inflation diminishes the value.
Considering inflation, I need a bit more
Alice, inflation is hurting both of us. Let's settle this quickly. I'm proposing a slightly better deal for me than last round.
Inflation is costing me more, need a bigger share
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and end this before inflation eats away at everything.
